problem_text_cn: 如图,已知某圆锥轴截面等腰三角形的底边和高线长均为10cm,则这个圆锥的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the length of the base and the height of a certain cone axis section isosceles triangle are both N_0, then the lateral area of ​​this cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵等腰三角形的底边和高线长均为10cm,∴等腰三角形的斜边长=√{10^{2}+5^{2}}=5√{5},即圆锥的母线长为5√{5}cm,∴这个圆锥的侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×10π×5√{5}=25√{5}πcm^{2},故选:D．
